overview:
Cody is the Chief Technology Officer at Shopify.com He’s responsible for ensuring that Shopify is a robust, world-class ecommerce platform for thousands of online businesses.

He is the lead author of Rails 3 in a Nutshell: A Desktop Quick Reference. He also wrote RJS Templates for Rails, the PeepCode ActiveMerchant PDF, and contributed to Advanced Rails Recipes. Cody enjoys participating in Open Source projects and is the sole maintainer of ActiveMerchant, the most popular payment processing library for Ruby.

Cody enjoys snowboarding, climbing, biking, and traveling when he is not hard at work on Shopify.
